5.4 SUPPORT. DESK. E.piphany allows for unlimited calls to its technical support desk by the HSNS personnel designated under Section 5.7 ("HSNS Responsibilities.") The technical support desk hours of operation are from 7:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. Pacific Time, Monday through Friday except holidays.
